metadata.title: CVE-2023-5850 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Incorrect security UI in Downloads in Google Chrome prior to 119.0.6045.105allowed a remote attacker to perform domain spoofing via a crafted domainname. (Chromium security severity: Medium)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
